pkgmetadata.longdescription: Dogecoin Core Qt for desktop environment. Fun-loving, highly secure, peer-to-peer digital currency with ultra-low transaction fees featuring Graphical User Interface with statistical analysis, console interaction and wallet support. Fast and lightweight; the default installation for desktop keeps downloaded blockchain size below 2.2GB, making it ideal for daily transactions, even on systems where disk space could be limited.
